languages.text: Священное Горнило оказалось механизмом по преображению планет. Чудовищные землетрясения сотрясли Фолстоун, монастырь Ордена Молота пострадал. Но вскоре суровые пустоши планеты зазеленели.

The hallowed Crucible turned out to be a mechanism for reshaping planets. Foulstone was struck by powerful earthquakes that scarred the monastery of the Order of the Hammer. Soon afterward, however, the planet's harsh wastes were transformed into lush pastures.
languages.original_text: Священное Горнило оказалось механизмом по преображению планет. Чудовищные землетрясения сотрясли Фолстоун, монастырь Ордена Молота пострадал. Но вскоре суровые пустоши планеты зазеленели.

traits.locale_text: The hallowed Crucible turned out to be a mechanism for reshaping planets. Foulstone was struck by powerful earthquakes that scarred the monastery of the Order of the Hammer. Soon afterward, however, the planet's harsh wastes turned into lush pastures.

The hallowed Crucible turned out to be a mechanism for reshaping planets. Foulstone was struck by powerful earthquakes that scarred the monastery of the Order of the Hammer. Soon afterward, however, the planet's harsh wastes turned into lush pastures.

The hallowed Crucible turned out to be a mechanism for reshaping planets. Foulstone was struck by powerful earthquakes that scarred the monastery of the Order of the Hammer. Soon afterward, however, the planet's harsh wastes were transformed into lush pastures.

languages.text: Le Creuset sacré s'est révélé être un mécanisme permettant de remodeler les planètes. Rochepeste a été frappée par de puissants séismes qui ont endommagé le monastère de l'Ordre du Marteau. Peu après, toutefois, les déserts inhospitaliers de la planète se sont transformés en pâturages verdoyants.
languages.original_text: The hallowed Crucible turned out to be a mechanism for reshaping planets. Foulstone was struck by powerful earthquakes that scarred the monastery of the Order of the Hammer. Soon afterward, however, the planet's harsh wastes were transformed into lush pastures.

traits.locale_text: Le Creuset sacré s'est révélé être un mécanisme permettant de remodeler les planètes. Rochepeste a été frappée par de puissants séismes qui ont endommagé le monastère de l'Ordre du Marteau. Peu après, toutefois, les déserts inhospitaliers de la planète se sont transformés en pâturages verdoyants.

languages.text: 神聖なる坩堝は、惑星を再形成するメカニズムであることが判明した。ファウルストーンは強力な地震に襲われ、ハンマー騎士団の修道院に大きな被害をもたらした。しかしその後すぐに、この惑星の過酷な荒野は緑豊かな牧草地へと姿を変えた。
languages.original_text: The hallowed Crucible turned out to be a mechanism for reshaping planets. Foulstone was struck by powerful earthquakes that scarred the monastery of the Order of the Hammer. Soon afterward, however, the planet's harsh wastes were transformed into lush pastures.

traits.locale_text: 神聖なる坩堝は、惑星を再形成するメカニズムであることが判明した。ファウルストーンは強力な地震に襲われ、ハンマー騎士団の修道院に大きな被害をもたらした。しかしその後すぐに、この惑星の過酷な荒野は緑豊かな牧草地へと姿を変えた。

languages.text: 原来，圣物熔炉是一种用来重塑行星的机器。荒寂岩地发生了强烈的地震，破坏了重锤修会的修道院，但不久之后，行星荒芜的表面重新长成了一片郁郁葱葱的牧场。
languages.original_text: The hallowed Crucible turned out to be a mechanism for reshaping planets. Foulstone was struck by powerful earthquakes that scarred the monastery of the Order of the Hammer. Soon afterward, however, the planet's harsh wastes were transformed into lush pastures.

traits.locale_text: 原来，圣物熔炉是一种用来重塑行星的机器。荒寂岩地发生了强烈的地震，破坏了重锤修会的修道院，但不久之后，行星荒芜的表面重新长成了一片郁郁葱葱的牧场。

languages.text: El sagrado crisol resultó ser un mecanismo para remodelar planetas. Rocainmunda sufrió poderosos terremotos que dejaron cicatrices en el monasterio de la Orden del Martillo. Poco después, sin embargo, los duros páramos del planeta se transformaron en exuberantes pastos.
languages.original_text: The hallowed Crucible turned out to be a mechanism for reshaping planets. Foulstone was struck by powerful earthquakes that scarred the monastery of the Order of the Hammer. Soon afterward, however, the planet's harsh wastes were transformed into lush pastures.

traits.locale_text: El sagrado crisol resultó ser un mecanismo para remodelar planetas. Rocainmunda sufrió poderosos terremotos que dejaron cicatrices en el monasterio de la Orden del Martillo. Poco después, sin embargo, los duros páramos del planeta se transformaron en exuberantes pastos.

languages.text: Der legendäre Tiegel hat sich als Mechanismus für die Umgestaltung von Planeten erwiesen. Foulstone wurde von gewaltigen Erdbeben heimgesucht, durch die das Kloster des Ordens des Hammers schwer beschädigt wurde. Bald darauf jedoch wurden die rauen Einöden des Planeten in saftige Weiden verwandelt.
languages.original_text: The hallowed Crucible turned out to be a mechanism for reshaping planets. Foulstone was struck by powerful earthquakes that scarred the monastery of the Order of the Hammer. Soon afterward, however, the planet's harsh wastes were transformed into lush pastures.

traits.locale_text: Der legendäre Tiegel hat sich als Mechanismus für die Umgestaltung von Planeten erwiesen. Foulstone wurde von gewaltigen Erdbeben heimgesucht, durch die das Kloster des Ordens des Hammers schwer beschädigt wurde. Bald darauf jedoch wurden die rauen Einöden des Planeten in saftige Weiden verwandelt.

languages.text: Mukaddes Pota'nın, aslında gezegenleri yeniden şekillendiren bir mekanizma olduğu ortaya çıktı. Menfurtaş, Çekiç Tarikatı'nın manastırında yaralar açan güçlü depremlerle sarsıldı. Ancak çok geçmeden gezegenin amansız çorak toprakları yemyeşil çayırlara dönüştü.
languages.original_text: The hallowed Crucible turned out to be a mechanism for reshaping planets. Foulstone was struck by powerful earthquakes that scarred the monastery of the Order of the Hammer. Soon afterward, however, the planet's harsh wastes were transformed into lush pastures.
